definition: Málaga, Spain/Malaga city in Iranian East Azerbaijan
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Muslim man prayed during at a mosque in Malaga, southern Spain, Monday.
sentences.chinese: 斋月，一名穆斯林男子在马拉加的一间清真寺内祷告。

sentences.english: I want to ask where does Cains wife came from?
sentences.chinese: 我想问马拉加妻子来自何方？

sentences.english: When we arrived Malaga airport, it was already 9pm.
sentences.chinese: 当我们到达马拉加机场时，已经是晚上9点了。

sentences.english: Our apartment was located in Malaga, just very close to the coast.
sentences.chinese: 我们的酒店公寓坐落于马拉加海滨附近。

sentences.english: Now we were waiting for our flight to Munich at Malaga airport.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们在马拉加机场等候飞往慕尼黑的航班。

sentences.english: Banderas, 49, was born in Malaga, Spain.
sentences.chinese: 班德拉斯现年49岁，生于西班牙马拉加。

sentences.english: Now it was ready for landing on Malaga airport.
sentences.chinese: 此刻飞机正准备在马拉加机场着陆。

sentences.english: Cucumbers for sale at a market in Malaga, Spain, in late May.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜于在马拉加，西班牙，市场销售在5月下旬。

sentences.english: Malaga is a lovely city and the architecture is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 马拉加是个可爱的城市，建筑物都很美丽。

pinyin: La1 si1 pa4 er3 ma3 si1

definition: La Coruña or A Coruña (city in Galicia, Spain)
Gijón (Asturian: Xixón), city in northwest Spain on the bay of Biscay
La Liga, the top division of the Spanish football league system
